title: Beau geste
overview: On set, in preview, at festivals, in France and abroad, on intimate films such as popular comedies. Pierre Lescure, former president of the Cannes Film Festival, discusses with artists who make the news in places that make sense: cinemas, museums, or bookstores. In parallel with its meetings, the editorial staff of "Beau Geste" covers cinematographic events to feed a weekly soap opera immersed in the vast cinema world.
